talents.name: Echoes of the Hive
talents.description: The survivor begins to hear faint whispers and fragmented thoughts from nearby infected, as if their mind is tuning into a grotesque hive consciousness. These echoes are disjointed and overwhelming, often drowning out their own thoughts.
talents.appearance: The survivor's eyes develop a faint, pulsating glow, and their veins occasionally shimmer with bioluminescent traces when the whispers grow louder.
benefits: Can sometimes sense the presence of infected before they are visible
May pick up on the general direction of large hordes
disadvantages: Frequent confusion and difficulty concentrating due to the invasive whispers
Risk of paranoia or mistaking real voices for the hive's echoes
talents.progression: Over time, the whispers grow louder and more coherent, potentially leading to full auditory hallucinations or even temporary loss of self-identity as the hive's thoughts dominate.
talents.treatment: Psychoactive suppressants can temporarily mute the whispers, but prolonged exposure to the fungal groves may worsen the condition. Complete isolation from infected areas might slow progression.
talents.benefit: Can sometimes sense the presence of infected before they are visible, May pick up on the general direction of large hordes
talents.drawback: Frequent confusion and difficulty concentrating due to the invasive whispers, Risk of paranoia or mistaking real voices for the hive's echoes, Increased stress and mental fatigue

talents.name: Hive Whisperer
talents.description: You've learned to distinguish the subtle patterns in the whispers of the infected hivemind. The constant murmurs that drive others mad now provide you with early warnings of nearby threats. Your mind has adapted to filter the noise into useful information.
talents.benefit: +15% detection range for approaching zombie hordes, reduced penalty to perception checks in areas with hive activity
talents.drawback: Permanent -1 to sanity checks due to constant exposure to hive whispers
talents.acquisition_method: Developed after prolonged exposure to areas with strong hive presence (e.g., Generator Room during storm events)
talents.flavor_text: 'The voices don't stop... but now I understand what they're saying.' - Scratched note found near a radio tower

talents.name: Scavenger's Ingenuity
talents.description: Allows the survivor to craft makeshift weapons and tools from seemingly useless scrap. With a keen eye for repurposing, even the most broken items can be turned into something deadly or useful.
talents.benefit: Unlocks unique crafting recipes that require fewer resources and can be made from low-quality materials. Increases the durability of improvised items by 25%.
talents.drawback: Improvised items may have reduced effectiveness compared to their professionally made counterparts.
talents.acquisition_method: Learned after successfully crafting 15 different improvised items or finding a rare 'Junker's Handbook' in abandoned workshops.
talents.flavor_text: "One man's trash is another man's ticket to survival. Just don't ask me to fix your moral compass while I'm at it."
